page.title: 05THE DAY OF A NURSERY CHILD.
page.content: I am 4. I go to school in the afternoon. You play all different things. I play in the baker's shop. I play with the slide and the jigsaws. I like painting best. I paint rainbows. We sit down in the home corner and do the register. Sometimes we go outside. We play on the bikes outside and run around. We do planting. George, the gardener, made the butterfly garden. It is round. We planted pretty flowers. My mammy comes to Nursery to bake. We have snacks and milk. Then we sing. I like playing with the "Lego".We have a story. We do our prayers when mammy is coming.
